data.title: Specific protein supplementation using soya, casein or whey differentially affects regional gut growth and luminal growth factor bioactivity in rats; implications for the treatment of gut injury and stimulating repair
data.abstract: Differential enhancement of luminal growth factor bioactivity and targeted regional gut growth occurs dependent on dietary protein supplement.
